full_text:
ENJOINING COLLECTION FORBIDDEN.

	No injunction or writ of mandate or other legal or equitable process shall issue in any suit, action or proceeding in any court against the State or this City, or against any officer of the State or this City, to prevent or enjoin the collection under this ordinance, or Part 1.5 of Division 2 of the Revenue and Taxation Code, of any tax or any amount of tax required to be collected.

7.catch_line: Application Of Provisions Relating To Exclusions And Exemptions.

9.catch_line: Existing Sales And Use Tax Ordinances Suspended.

next_section.catch_line: Existing Sales And Use Tax Ordinances Suspended.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

ENJOINING COLLECTION FORBIDDEN. (§ 21.6.7)

  ENJOINING COLLECTION FORBIDDEN.	No injunction or writ of mandate or other
legal or equitable process shall issue in any suit, action or proceeding in any
court against the State or this City, or against any officer of the State or
this City, to prevent or enjoin the collection under this ordinance, or Part 1.5
of Division 2 of the Revenue and Taxation Code, of any tax or any amount of tax
required to be collected.
